Cambodia: Thousands of Cham settle in Cambodia as refugees from the fall of Vijaya (northern section of Champa) to the Vietnamese.
Peru: Pachacuti died. His son Tupac Inca Yupanqui succeeded him.
Russia: Battle of Shelon: A Muscovite army defeated a numerically superior Novgorodian force.
Sweden: The Battle of Brunkeberg takes place.
